summary: Diff updates the marketing header/footer logo to use a /generated/... path and adds a centralized generatedAssetPaths.ts map. However, there is no evidence that the required PNG was added under frontend/public/generated, no evidence of build-time copying to dist, and no evidence of the requested build-time verification step for generated PNG presence/dimensions. Navigation link fixes are only partially evidenced (some footer links changed), while other required link audits are not shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the marketing logo PNG exists under frontend/public/generated/ and is copied into frontend/dist/generated/ at build time, and is served from /generated/... reliably in header and footer.
missing_requirements.reason: The header/footer now reference /generated/energyoptim-ai-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png, but the diff shows no new/added asset file under frontend/public/generated and no build/pipeline changes that ensure copying into frontend/dist/generated at build time.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix broken internal navigation links in the marketing header/footer so every internal link matches an existing route in frontend/src/App.tsx (e.g., Partner Marketplace and Privacy).
missing_requirements.reason: Only a subset of footer links are visible; the header is truncated and there is no evidence that 'Partner Marketplace' was updated to a valid route, nor that all header/footer internal hrefs were audited against App.tsx routes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add build-time verification for all generated PNGs referenced by the marketing header/footer (including the 200x200 logo) to fail the build with clear English errors if missing or wrong dimensions.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes no build script changes (e.g., frontend/vite-build-verify.js) or any verification logic that checks existence and pixel dimensions for the referenced generated PNGs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit other prominent internal navigation links on marketing-facing pages (LandingPage CTAs and device guide buttons) to ensure they resolve to existing App.tsx routes.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to landing page CTAs or device guide buttons are shown in the diff summary, so there is no evidence that these links were audited/fixed.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded region and language preference handling in the MarketingHeader (localStorage persistence and CustomEvent dispatch).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to fixing broken image asset paths and broken internal navigation links; region/language preference state and events are new functionality not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a centralized GENERATED_ASSETS registry covering many generated images beyond the marketing header/footer logo.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQs only ask to fix the marketing logo path and add build-time verification for generated PNGs referenced by header/footer; a broad asset registry for many other images is not explicitly requested.
